Interface Question

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MultipleChoiceQuestion, TrueFalseQuestion

    public interface Question
    Interface for questions.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Oscar Nevarez

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String[] getAnswer()
      This method returns the answers field of the attached question object.
      java.lang.String[] getChoices()
      This method returns the choices field of the attached question object.
      java.lang.String getQuestion()
      This method returns this Questions 'question' field.
      void setAnswer(java.lang.String[] answer)
      This method assigns the string array parameter to this Questions answer field
      void setChoices(java.lang.String[] choices)
      This method sets this instance choices field to that of the parameter.
      void setQuestion(java.lang.String question)
      This method assigns the parameter to this instances question field.

    • Method Detail

      • setQuestion

        void setQuestion(java.lang.String question)
        This method assigns the parameter to this instances question field.
        Parameters:
        question - the string that will be assigned to this instances question field

      • getQuestion

        java.lang.String getQuestion()
        This method returns this Questions 'question' field.
        Returns:
        this instances question field as string

      • setChoices

        void setChoices(java.lang.String[] choices)
        This method sets this instance choices field to that of the parameter.
        Parameters:
        choices - the string array of choices that will be assigned to this instance choices field

      • getChoices

        java.lang.String[] getChoices()
        This method returns the choices field of the attached question object.
        Returns:
        this questions available choices as a string array.

      • setAnswer

        void setAnswer(java.lang.String[] answer)
        This method assigns the string array parameter to this Questions answer field
        Parameters:
        answer - the string array that represents this Questions answer field

      • getAnswer

        java.lang.String[] getAnswer()
        This method returns the answers field of the attached question object.
        Returns:
        this questions available answers as a string array
